capture_peak_action_activity::clip_card_: Anticipate your subject's movement, and capture peak action of their activity.
capture_peak_action_activity::text_card_: Congratulations on completing Mobile Photo 101! Don't forget to share your photos with the StoryMaker community by tagging them #StoryMakerPics

Now that you've completed the lesson on peak action, this activity will help you practice. Find an activity that repeats, such as a sport or children playing. Photographing movement with a mobile device can be especially difficult.
You can return home by hitting the back button next to the StoryMaker icon at the top of your screen.
capture_peak_action_activity::title: Capture Peak Action Activity
